thread.title: Canada in top shape after six-day camping ahead of Ghana friendly
thread.title_full: Canada in top shape after six-day camping ahead of Ghana friendly

title: Canada in top shape after six-day camping ahead of Ghana friendly
text:
Sports News | 11 October 2015 19:40 CET Canada in top shape after six-day camping ahead of Ghana friendly - www.ghanasoccernet.com 
Canada assistant coach Michael Findlay says his side is in top shape to face Ghana in Tuesday’s international friendly after a six-day camp in Florida to prepare to face the Black Stars. 
With November's crucial FIFA World Cup Qualifiersâ„¢ looming on the horizon, a youthful Canada's Men's National Team squad have enjoyed a productive six-day camp in Orlando, Florida. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
